metadata.title: NOW Solutions, Xyliwhite™ Toothpaste Gel, Platinum Mint, Cleanses and Whitens, Fresh Taste (Pack of 2)
features: CLEANSES AND WHITENS: XyliWhite is a remarkable fluoride-free toothpaste gel that uses xylitol as its main ingredient.
FOR ADULTS AND CHILDREN: Do you know a vegan that always talks about oil pulling? Turn them on to this remarkable fluoride-free toothpaste gel.
FRESH TASTE: Formulated with the purest ingredients. Free of SLS (sodium lauryl sulfate).

GMP Quality Assured: NPA A-rated GMP certification means that every aspect of the NOW manufacturing process has been examined, including our laboratory/testing methods (for stability, potency, and product formulation).
Packaged in the USA by a family owned and operated company since 1968.
description: XyliWhite™ is a remarkable fluoride-free toothpaste gel that uses xylitol as its main ingredient. Do you know a vegan that always talks about oil pulling? Turn them on to this remarkable fluoride-free toothpaste gel, XyliWhite™ Coconut Oil Toothpaste, that uses xylitol as its main ingredient. For adults and children. Formulated with the purest ingredients. Free of SLS (sodium lauryl sulfate).
